Attribute.Name: AverageCost
Attribute.Description: Current Average Cost of the parent item at the production location.

Attribute.Name: InventoryValue
Attribute.Description: Current Inventory value of the parent item at production location.

Attribute.Name: ItemID
Attribute.Description: Item Id of the parent item produced.

Attribute.Name: PostingClassification
Attribute.Description: Posting Classification of the parent item produced.

Attribute.Name: PrimarySupplier
Attribute.Description: Primary Supplier of the parent item produced.

Attribute.Name: ProductClass
Attribute.Description: Product Class of the parent item produced.

Attribute.Name: ShipNode
Attribute.Description: Production location of the parent item.

Attribute.Name: UnitOfMeasure
Attribute.Description: Unit Of Measure of the parent item produced.
